website_summaries.verdict: The widely popular Under Armour Drift gets a slight twist in the Mineral version. It sports a fabric-like upper that really hugs the foot. The shoe has loads of comfort, very good arch support, and the looks to match many of the more expensive shoes in the market. With the kind of aesthetic value and performance this shoe brings, the already reasonable price tag should feel like a steal for runners who are looking for a lightweight shoe that can match speed mid-distance runs with ease.
pros: Most of the customer reviews included comfort as a major asset of the Under Armour Drift Mineral
The testers generally had positive remarks about its lightweight nature
Many were very happy to receive compliments while wearing this shoe
Some runners stated that it remained comfortable when used for casual walks or for gym workouts
There are several color combinations available
A few runners noted how well the shoe supported their arches
More than a handful use it for all-day purposes
According to a reviewer, the upper fabrics were stretchy enough to accommodate the natural form of the foot
cons: The Drift Mineral from Under Armour runs small, according to more than a handful of reviewers
It does not hold up to usual wear and tear, based on the observations of a few runners
A small number of runners thought that it fell narrow in the forefoot
There were a couple of users who experienced rubbing and blisters in their heels
Some consumers thought that the actual shoe didn’t look as appealing as it was on the pictures online

customer_reviews.title: I own several other pair of Under Armour shoes in ...
customer_reviews.text: I own several other pair of Under Armour shoes in a size 9 but my toes touch the end in these. They are also tight around the foot and somewhat difficult to slip on. Not for people with wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Matches Everything
customer_reviews.text: I got these on a really good sale because they only had 1 size in stock at the time and it happened to be my size. The color is great, it matches anything and they are really comfortable. I love how Under Armour is starting to make the upper of the shoes as one whole piece instead of having a tongue that you have to keep straight. I'd give these shoes 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Dabbzy

customer_reviews.title: Bad deal
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these for my wife in a size 8 and received a size 7.5 we returned them and the replacement shoes were still a 7.5. We then requested one mor time to receive the size 8 we ordered and again we got a size 7.5. I’m super disappointed with this it cost me time and money not once but 3 times in fuel to send them back. The company that sells these shoes either dose not know how to tell the difference between 7.5 and 8 or dose not care.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan bergstresser

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust this seller, false advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this sneaker 3 times in 2 different colors and each time received a girls size 8 instead of women’s. I also ordered in men’s. The sneaker itself is awesome! I love the wide toe box, it’s very comfortable and flat, I like that. But I cannot get the correct size as advertised. The description is totally false, and I don’t think they sell women’s/men’s sneakers. It’s unfortunate. So just know, if you buy men’s and get a girls, don’t bother. Happened to me 3 times and now I just have to go to the store and buy it so I can be sure I’m getting what’s asked for. DO NOT TRUST THIS SELLER.
customer_reviews.author: SweetCocoa

customer_reviews.title: Shouldn't these be listed as a woman shoe?
customer_reviews.text: I'm almost positive this isn't a male shoe. While I wear a male size 9, my wife wears a female size 9, and these fit her perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe but...
customer_reviews.text: I liked these shoes but did have to send them back. For me they were to small. I have nerve damage in my feet so I am somewhat picky when it comes to shoes. These look great but they did just not feel right on my feet. I did send them back to UA with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: M. Harshberger

customer_reviews.title: I love material and look of these shoes but they feel ...
customer_reviews.text: I love material and look of these shoes but they feel a little too small :( I already wore them out or I'd return for bigger size. I normally wear a 7 and I ordered a 7 1/2 after ready reviews decided to go up a half a size but I should've went for the full size up and bought a size 8
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoe, but sized too small.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well-made and good looking shoe, but it is sized way too small. According to Under Armour’s size chart, my son should fit into a 7.5, but even an 8 was too small. I would recommend going at least one size up.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie P.

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Had to return...fit was way to small, like 3 sizes too small. I have similar style UA sneakers and they don’t fit like that, just weird shoe/sizing. Plus came in just the brown amazon box, did not arrive with the under armour shoe box or with UA tags. Can’t recommend. If you do order, trust me and definitely order a couple sizes up.
customer_reviews.author: jemma

customer_reviews.title: Size smaller than the same size in the store.
customer_reviews.text: Why is the size smaller than the american size i obtain in the store?
customer_reviews.author: Eddie

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put on
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable but they are almost like a sock with ties. I have very high arches so it was hard to put the shoe on. I do like them and I think they are cute. The material of the part that has the laces is almost like cork which I think is unique.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Z

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!!! Love them!! I just ordered the same pair but a different color!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my stepson. The rubber comes up too high on the side, so he wasn’t able to even get them on. We returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie McMinn

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. I wear a men's 12, but these comfortably fit my wife who wears a women's 11. Nice looking shoe other than that.
customer_reviews.author: Renae Roth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but will need to work into them
customer_reviews.text: I order a slightly larger size then I normally do.. when I got the shoe it was tight around my food. So much so my feet would go numb.. but after two weeks of use they started to loosen up
customer_reviews.author: jaxie

customer_reviews.title: Fit was better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Fit was better than expected! I have a wide foot, and this is the best wide shoe I have ever had on my foot. Asics, Nike, New Balance, and Saucony never fit as nicely as this shoe. So glad I pulled the trigger!
customer_reviews.author: Cold War Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horrible shoe, I couldn’t even get my foot in the shoe. The design is awful! Like I said I couldn’t even get the shoe in and I have Nero thin feet!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany moore

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my feet
customer_reviews.text: Probably the hardest pair of shoes I’ve ever owned. Wore them once and regretted it. If I could send them back I would. I owned a pair (same brand and style) from a few years ago and they are awesome. Not sure what happened to these.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Size Up
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the color and everything. However, it fits at least one size small. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Callofduty62

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get on.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice shoe. Ordered 1 size larger but couldn't get foot into the small opening.
customer_reviews.author: NWWI.

customer_reviews.title: Less than
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as most UA shoes. Surprisingly so considering they have a full surround, non-tongue slip on ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Prins

customer_reviews.title: Not even right size
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 9.5 mens and they say 9.5 but the shoes are a size and a half to small
customer_reviews.author: Emmycc

customer_reviews.title: Cut small
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is great however as a size 9M go up a size. It’s cut small. The 9.5 was a much better fit
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: Not the same under armor make.
customer_reviews.text: Bought one same shoes at store 11 fit perfect.buy one same shoes on Amazon make not the same. To small.
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: The size
customer_reviews.text: Liked the fit. However the color could of been a bit nicer.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Trevino

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. I have 6 pair and All are 7.5. Not sure why these so small Color does not look like picture
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Too snug for me
customer_reviews.text: Extremely tight in the part around your ankel. The pull on part
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but runs small. I am 8 and I think 8.5 will be perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: Not stretchy
customer_reviews.text: The length is my sons shoe size but the opening does not stretch so he could not get his foot in
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Order a .5 up!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a size 7 but very tight around the toes. The shoe design is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Alon_Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing exciting about the shoes but they are very comfortable to wear and work out in.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size way up when purchasing
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 9 fit like 7. Most bizzare sizing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hardy

customer_reviews.title: Actually Women's Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these 4 times and received a women's size all 4 times.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Seiverd

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to return
customer_reviews.text: I would have no problems with this product if it was easy to return.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a mens size 8.5 but had to order a 9.5 and they are still a little too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Boersma

customer_reviews.title: ... sneaker near leg after they are on they are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Getting on is hard has a fabric that is tight around top sneaker near leg after they are on they are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Size is very small
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of UA and these shoes fit very small
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

product_meta.title: Under Armour Women's Drift Mineral Running Shoes Sneaker, Glacier Gray (002)/White, 5.5 UK
product_meta.description: Soft, breathable printed mesh is lightweight & extremely durable. Synthetic overlays provide structure & midfoot lockdown. Molded toe cap for increased protection & durability. Full-length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit. Cushioned EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride. Strategically placed rubber traction covers high impact zones for greater durability with less weight. Offset: 10 mm. Weight: 7.5 oz.
feature_bullets: Soft, breathable printed mesh is lightweight & extremely durable
Synthetic overlays provide structure & midfoot lockdown
Molded toe cap for increased protection & durability
Full length EVA sockliner for added comfort & a custom fit
Cushioned EVA midsole delivers a lightweight & responsive ride
